[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Eval {
            eval: Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 1,
                position: 7,
            },
            start: Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 5,
                position: 11,
            },
            value: InterpolatedString {
                parts: [
                    Literal(
                        """,
                    ),
                    Expression(
                        Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span {
                                        line: 3,
                                        column: 7,
                                        position: 13,
                                    },
                                    name: "$a",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                    ),
                    Literal(
                        " = 1;",
                    ),
                ],
            },
            end: Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 15,
                position: 21,
            },
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 16,
                position: 22,
            },
        ),
    },
]
